page.description: The following function briefly displays a form object.

section.example: function time_display_object as V (obj as P ) dim n as N obj.show() n = toseconds( time() ) wait_until( toseconds( time() ) > n+2) obj.hide() end function

section.description: The following script was attached to the OnPush event of a button on a form. It uses the function above to briefly display an initially hidden CUSTOMER_ID field on the form.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = topparent.CUSTOMER_ID time_display_object(ptr)
